description:
When building instance a MaxRetryExceeded exception can be raised which is handle by an unbound local variable request_spec.

in nova/conductor/manager.py, method build_instance()
title: Unbound local variable request_spec

comments.content:
When building instance a MaxRetryExceeded exception can be raised which is handle by an unbound local variable request_spec.

in nova/conductor/manager.py, method build_instance()

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/257344
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=04b7c27dfb446cfce508db32643bed3220b117b1

Branch:    master

commit 04b7c27dfb446cfce508db32643bed3220b117b1
Author: Sahid Orentino Ferdjaoui <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Dec 14 08:18:50 2015 -0500

    conductor: fix unbound local variable request_spec
    
    Moves build request_spec in order to use it when a max retry exceeded
    exception is raised.
    
    Closes-Bug: 1527497
    Change-Id: Ia16b09d259d1c72e9d0af4075f0810a26602f7ad
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
